body.p: My dear Sir I am satisifed that the public interest will be promoted by the pardon of John Mount This opinion is based upon information upon which I rely -- I respectfully ask that he be pardoned -- I would not hestitate to pardon if I had the power

Very truly
J F Robinson
Sunday Aug 17/62/

Franklin Cir Ct.
John Mount
2 ys. Penty
Aug. 186 1862
